definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: This is the web page of Invertebrate Systematics.
sentences.chinese: 这是无脊椎动物系统分类学的网页。

sentences.english: Finally, Taxonomical significance of the pollens of Allium is discussed by author.
sentences.chinese: 文中对花粉资料的分类学意义进行了探讨。

sentences.english: This paper is systematic cytotaxonomy studies to plants of five genera of Caryophyllaceae.
sentences.chinese: 本文对石竹科部分属的植物进行了细胞分类学研究。

sentences.english: Genera may be subdivided into subgenera, and also, especially in plant taxonomy, into sections, subsection, series, and subseries.
sentences.chinese: 在植物分类学中，属一般可再分为亚属。

sentences.english: A taxonomic discussion on genus Carex L. sect. Boernera.
sentences.chinese: 关于苔草属寸草组的分类学讨论。

sentences.english: The taxonomic classification of the species has long been the subject of an ongoing debate
sentences.chinese: 此物种的分类学分类长期是争论的话题。

sentences.english: Imagine an 8-year-old kid looking at taxonomy books.
sentences.chinese: 想想看，我从八岁时就阅读分类学著作。

sentences.english: Number taxonomy is an identifier taxonomy.
sentences.chinese: 号分类学是一个标识符分类法。

sentences.english: Variation patterns and systematics of the widespread species Epilobium angustifolium L. (Onagraceae) in China.
sentences.chinese: 柳兰广布种在中国的变异式样及其分类学。

sentences.english: However, the taxonomical classification remained unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 然而，其分类学分类仍未改变。

sentences.english: Saponins of the rhizome of Panax japonicus var. bipinnatifidus and its significance of chemotaxonomy.
sentences.chinese: 羽叶三七根茎的三萜皂甙成分及其化学分类学意义。

sentences.english: Studies of numerical classification on the plants of Equisetaceae in China.
sentences.chinese: 中国木贼科植物的数量分类学研究。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To make the kit to identify Cornu Cervi Pantotrichum with molecular taxonomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立中药材鹿茸的分子分类学鉴定试剂盒。

sentences.english: Objective To inquire into the value of the features of eggs of Paragonimus proliferus and Pagumogonimus skrjabini in classification.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨虫卵的特征在并殖吸虫分类学上的意义。

sentences.english: The taxonomic and ecological diversity of these organisms is large.
sentences.chinese: 在分类学和生态学上，这些生物多种多样。

sentences.english: Taxonomists have long struggled to determine how many Promyrmekiaphila species there are.
sentences.chinese: 分类学家一直无法判定土蜘蛛属中究竟有几个种。

definition: angiosperm (flowering plants with seed contained in a fruit)
binomial nomenclature (taxonomy)/same as 雙名法|双名法[shuang1 ming2 fa3]
